title: Purchased the "First Strike Augment + Bundle"
body:
so as stated above i bought the bundle didnt get the ward skin then had to purchase it for 1 rp then noticed also there
was no "bonus" things that were meant to go along with it, 

BONUS ITEMS
PROJECT: ASHE CACHE
PROJECT: EKKO CACHE
PROJECT: KATARINA CACHE
EM CASTER ICON
DECRYPTER ICON
HYPER EDGE ICON
RECON PROJECT: ASHE ICON

also no boarder change either like the last set had i have purchased today and wondering how this could be fixed ?

replies.body:
Hey there,

[This is currently known and is being worked on.](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/AEWspTEF-i-bought-the-project-bundle-and-i-didnt-get-the-ward-skin?comment=0007)

>Hi everyone, deeply sorry about this.

>We're investigating what is causing these bonus items to fail. Rest assured that if you've purchased the First Strike Augment + Bundle and not received these bonus items (the PROJECT skin caches and Recon Drone Ward), you will receive them eventually.

>We'll try to keep you updated on when this is fixed and when to expect these items to be properly redeemed to your account.
